details:
It was discovered that there was an external entity expansion vulnerability
in jackson-databind, a Java library for processing JSON.


* [CVE-2020-25649](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2020-25649)


For Debian 9 Stretch, these problems have been fixed in version
2.8.6-1+deb9u8.


We recommend that you upgrade your jackson-databind packages.


Further information about Debian LTS security advisories, how to apply
these updates to your system and frequently asked questions can be
found at: <https://wiki.debian.org/LTS>
